title: Chuck Amuck: The Life and Times of an Animated Cartoonist
features: Academy Award winning animator Chuck Jones looks back on his life and career, and explains how he and his fellow animators created cartoon characters
description: The director of Bugs Bunny cartoons and inventor of Roadrunner, Coyote and Pepe Le Pew reminisces about family life and work at Warner Brothers, paying tribute to directors, animators, writers and a sound-effects specialist. PW characterized this as a "short, unpretentious, amusing memoir." Illustrated. Author tour. Copyright 1990 Reed Business Information, Inc.
